tool_description: Display on your website, widget or app Inspirational Images, Motivational Pictures, Healing Quotes and more.
name: Universal Inspirational Quotes
title: Universal Inspirational Quotes

api_list.name: /v1/topics/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://healthruwords.p.rapidapi.com/v1/topics/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "healthruwords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://healthruwords.p.rapidapi.com/v1/topics/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "healthruwords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /v1/quotes/
api_list.description: Delivers Inspirational Quotes - if used without parameters, it will return one random quote (default behavior)

optional_parameters.name: t
optional_parameters.description: List of topics within which selection one or several quotes will be returned

optional_parameters.name: maxR
optional_parameters.description: Max number of quotes returned - Default: 1

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Defines the size of the image to be returned. Possible values: medium, thumbnail. Default value: thumbnail

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: Id of the quote - if specified a random quote will not be returned.
